con:request.name: request
con:request.con:request: { "appleId":"", "password":"", "reminderList":"Reminders", "priority":1, "title":"Get a birthday present for Lisa", "description":"Call Robert to ask what Lisa likes.", "alarm":"2017-01-01T00:00:00" }

con:restRequest.name: create
con:restRequest.con:request: { "appleId":"${#Project#appleId}", "password":"${#Project#password}", "reminderList":"Reminders", "priority":1, "title":"ias-19", "description":"ias-19 : create reminder - alarm - all elements given", "alarm":"2017-01-01T00:00:00" }

con:config.con:expectedResult: A reminder was generated on the iPhone. The values equal those given in the request.

con:restRequest.name: create
con:restRequest.con:request: { "appleId":"${#Project#appleId}", "password":"${#Project#password}", "priority":1, "title":"ias-20", "description":"ias-20 : create reminder - alarm - name of list missing", "alarm":"2017-01-01T00:00:00" }

con:assertion.name: message - The element reminderList is missing.

con:restRequest.name: create
con:restRequest.con:request: { "appleId":"${#Project#appleId}", "password":"${#Project#password}", "reminderList":"Reminders", "title":"ias-21", "description":"ias-21 : create reminder - alarm - priority missing", "alarm":"2017-01-01T00:00:00" }

con:config.con:expectedResult: A reminder was generated on the iPhone. The values equal those given in the request. The reminder is not marked with "!", "!!", or "!!!".

con:restRequest.name: create
con:restRequest.con:request: { "appleId":"${#Project#appleId}", "password":"${#Project#password}", "reminderList":"Reminders", "priority":1, "description":"ias-22 : create reminder - alarm - title missing", "alarm":"2017-01-01T00:00:00" }

con:assertion.name: message - The element title is missing.

con:restRequest.name: create
con:restRequest.con:request: { "appleId":"${#Project#appleId}", "password":"${#Project#password}", "reminderList":"Reminders", "priority":1, "title":"ias-23", "alarm":"2017-01-01T00:00:00" }

con:config.con:expectedResult: A reminder was generated on the iPhone. The values equal those given in the request.

con:restRequest.name: create
con:restRequest.con:request: { "appleId":"${#Project#appleId}", "password":"${#Project#password}", "reminderList":"Reminders", "priority":1, "title":"ias-24", "description":"ias-24 : create reminder - alarm - alarm missing" }

con:assertion.name: message - One or more elements are missing (latitude, longitude, alarm).

con:configuration.content: One or more elements are missing (latitude, longitude, alarm).

con:restRequest.name: create
con:restRequest.con:request: { "appleId":"${#Project#appleId}", "password":"${#Project#password}", "reminderList":"Reminders", "priority":1, "title":"ias-25", "description":"ias-25 : create reminder - geofence - arrive - all elements given", "proximity":"ARRIVE", "address":"Harrods, 87-135 Brompton Road, London SW1X 7XL", "locationName":"Harrods", "latitude":"51.4992917", "longitude":"-0.162811" }

con:config.con:expectedResult: A reminder was generated on the iPhone. The values equal those given in the request. The map shows the position given in the request. The reminder is configured to trigger on arrival.

con:restRequest.name: create
con:restRequest.con:request: { "appleId":"${#Project#appleId}", "password":"${#Project#password}", "reminderList":"Reminders", "priority":1, "title":"ias-26", "description":"ias-26 : create reminder - geofence - arrive - proximity missing", "address":"Harrods, 87-135 Brompton Road, London SW1X 7XL", "locationName":"Harrods", "latitude":"51.4992917", "longitude":"-0.162811" }

con:assertion.name: message - The element proximity is missing.

con:restRequest.name: create
con:restRequest.con:request: { "appleId":"${#Project#appleId}", "password":"${#Project#password}", "reminderList":"Reminders", "priority":1, "title":"ias-27", "description":"ias-27 : create reminder - geofence - arrive - address missing", "proximity":"ARRIVE", "locationName":"Harrods", "latitude":"51.4992917", "longitude":"-0.162811" }

con:config.con:expectedResult: A reminder was generated on the iPhone. The values equal those given in the request. The map shows the position given in the request.

con:restRequest.name: create
con:restRequest.con:request: { "appleId":"${#Project#appleId}", "password":"${#Project#password}", "reminderList":"Reminders", "priority":1, "title":"ias-28", "description":"ias-28 : create reminder - geofence - arrive - location name missing", "proximity":"ARRIVE", "address":"Harrods, 87-135 Brompton Road, London SW1X 7XL", "latitude":"51.4992917", "longitude":"-0.162811" }

con:config.con:expectedResult: A reminder was generated on the iPhone. The values equal those given in the request. The map shows the position given in the request.

con:restRequest.name: create
con:restRequest.con:request: { "appleId":"${#Project#appleId}", "password":"${#Project#password}", "reminderList":"Reminders", "priority":1, "title":"ias-29", "description":"ias-29 : create reminder - geofence - arrive - latitude missing", "proximity":"ARRIVE", "address":"Harrods, 87-135 Brompton Road, London SW1X 7XL", "locationName":"Harrods", "longitude":"-0.162811" }

con:assertion.name: message - The element latitude is missing.

con:restRequest.name: create
con:restRequest.con:request: { "appleId":"${#Project#appleId}", "password":"${#Project#password}", "reminderList":"Reminders", "priority":1, "title":"ias-30", "description":"ias-30 : create reminder - geofence - arrive - longitude missing", "proximity":"ARRIVE", "address":"Harrods, 87-135 Brompton Road, London SW1X 7XL", "locationName":"Harrods", "latitude":"51.4992917" }

con:assertion.name: message - The element longitude is missing.

con:restRequest.name: create
con:restRequest.con:request: { "appleId":"${#Project#appleId}", "password":"${#Project#password}", "reminderList":"Reminders", "priority":1, "title":"ias-31", "description":"ias-31 : create reminder - geofence - depart - all elements given", "proximity":"DEPART", "address":"Harrods, 87-135 Brompton Road, London SW1X 7XL", "locationName":"Harrods", "latitude":"51.4992917", "longitude":"-0.162811" }

con:config.con:expectedResult: A reminder was generated on the iPhone. The values equal those given in the request. The map shows the position given in the request. The reminder is configured to trigger on departure.

con:restRequest.name: create
con:restRequest.con:request: { "appleId":"${#Project#appleId}", "password":"${#Project#password}", "reminderList":"Reminders", "priority":1, "title":"ias-32", "description":"ias-32 : create reminder - geofence and alarm - all elements given", "proximity":"ARRIVE", "address":"Harrods, 87-135 Brompton Road, London SW1X 7XL", "locationName":"Harrods", "latitude":"51.4992917", "longitude":"-0.162811", "alarm":"2017-01-01T00:00:00" }

con:config.con:expectedResult: A reminder was generated on the iPhone. The values equal those given in the request. The map shows the position given in the request. The reminder is configured to trigger on arrival.

con:restRequest.name: create
con:restRequest.con:request: { "appleId":"${#Project#appleId}", "password":"${#Project#password}", "reminderList":"Reminders", "priority":1, "title":"ias-33", "description":"ias-33 : create reminder request - error while logging in to iCloud - host unreachable", "alarm":"2017-01-01T00:00:00" }

con:restRequest.name: create
con:restRequest.con:request: { "appleId":"xxxxxxxxxx", "password":"${#Project#password}", "reminderList":"Reminders", "priority":1, "title":"ias-35", "description":"ias-35 : create reminder request - error while creating reminder in iCloud - invalid user name", "alarm":"2017-01-01T00:00:00" }

con:restRequest.name: create
con:restRequest.con:request: { "appleId":"${#Project#appleId}", "password":"xxxxxxxxxx", "reminderList":"Reminders", "priority":1, "title":"ias-36", "description":"ias-36 : create reminder request - error while creating reminder in iCloud - invalid password", "alarm":"2017-01-01T00:00:00" }

con:restRequest.name: create
con:restRequest.con:request: { "appleId":"${#Project#appleId}", "password":"${#Project#password}", "reminderList":"Reminders", "priority":1, "title":"ias-37", "description":"ias-37 : Logging active", "alarm":"2017-01-01T00:00:00" }

con:config.con:expectedResult: Requests and responses are logged to the file given in the configuration.

con:restRequest.name: create
con:restRequest.con:request: { "appleId":"${#Project#appleId}", "password":"${#Project#password}", "reminderList":"Reminders", "priority":1, "title":"ias-38", "description":"ias-38 : Logging inactive", "alarm":"2017-01-01T00:00:00" }

con:config.con:expectedResult: Requests and responses must not be logged to the file given in the configuration.

con:restRequest.name: create
con:restRequest.con:request: { "appleId":"${#Project#appleId}", "password":"${#Project#password}", "reminderList":"Reminders", "priority":1, "title":"ias-39", "description":"ias-39 : Unable to write log file", "alarm":"2017-01-01T00:00:00" }

con:assertion.name: message - failed to append to file: Error: EACCES, open

con:configuration.regEx: failed to append to file: Error: EACCES, open.*

con:restRequest.name: create
con:restRequest.con:request: { "appleId":"${#Project#appleId}", "password":"${#Project#password}", "reminderList":"Reminders", "priority":1, "title":"ias-40", "description":"ias-40 : Time zone", "alarm":"2017-01-01T00:00:00" }

con:config.con:expectedResult: A reminder was generated on the iPhone. The values equal those given in the request.
